movies.title: Number Six
movies.plot: An international criminal arrives in London, and a detective is anxious to pin something on him for some unprovable murders of former lovers. The villain starts to suspect servants and henchmen of being a police spy known as "Number Six".
movies.simplePlot: An international criminal arrives in London, and a detective is anxious to pin something on him for some unprovable murders of former lovers. The villain starts to suspect servants and henchmen of being a police spy known as "Number Six".

biography.bio: Ivan Desny was born on December 28, 1922 in Peking, China as Ivan Nikolai Desnitskij. He was an actor, known for The Marriage of Maria Braun (1979), Anastasia (1956) and Lola, une femme allemande (1981). He was married to Ghislaine Arsac. He died on April 13, 2002 in Ascona, Switzerland.
biography.name: Ivan Desny

biography.bio: Nadja Regin was born on December 2, 1931 in Nis, Serbia, Yugoslavia as Nadezda Poderegin. She is an actress, known for Goldfinger (1964), From Russia with Love (1963) and Esalon doktora M. (1955).
biography.name: Nadja Regin

biography.bio: Michael Goodliffe was born on October 1, 1914 in Bebington, Cheshire, England as Lawrence Michael Andrew Goodliffe. He was an actor, known for Peeping Tom (1960), Sam (1973) and A Night to Remember (1958). He died on March 20, 1976 in Wimbledon, London, England.
biography.name: Michael Goodliffe

biography.bio: Brian Bedford was born on February 16, 1935 in Morley, Yorkshire, England. He was an actor, known for Robin Hood (1973), Nixon (1995) and Grand Prix (1966). He was married to Tim MacDonald. He died on January 13, 2016 in Santa Barbara, California, USA.
biography.name: Brian Bedford

biography.bio: Joyce Blair was born on November 4, 1932 in London, England as Joyce Ogus. She was an actress, known for Arch of Triumph (1984), Blonde Sinner (1956) and Lucy & Desi: Before the Laughter (1991). She died on August 19, 2006 in Santa Monica, California, USA.
biography.name: Joyce Blair

biography.bio: Leonard Sachs was born on September 26, 1909 in Roodeport, Transvaal, South Africa as Leonard Meyer Sachs. He was an actor and director, known for The Good Old Days (1953), Thunderball (1965) and Scream of Fear (1961). He was married to Eleanor Summerfield. He died on June 15, 1990 in Westminster, London, England.
biography.name: Leonard Sachs

biography.bio: Maxwell Shaw was born on February 21, 1929 in London, England. He was an actor, known for The Oblong Box (1969), Start the Revolution Without Me (1970) and Once More, with Feeling! (1960). He was married to Rose Tobias Shaw. He died on August 21, 1985 in London.
biography.name: Maxwell Shaw

biography.bio: Harold Goodwin was born on October 22, 1917 in Wombwell, Barnsley, Yorkshire, England. He was an actor, known for The Bridge on the River Kwai (1957), The Prince and the Showgirl (1957) and The Man in the White Suit (1951). He died on June 3, 2004 in Middlesex, England.
biography.name: Harold Goodwin

biography.bio: John Welsh was born on November 7, 1914 in Wexford, Ireland as John James Walsh. He was an actor and production manager, known for Krull (1983), Softly Softly (1966) and The Revenge of Frankenstein (1958). He died on April 21, 1985 in Richmond, London, England.
biography.name: John Welsh

biography.bio: Barrie Ingham was born on February 10, 1932 in Halifax, Yorkshire, England as Barrie Stanton Ingham. He was an actor, known for The Great Mouse Detective (1986), The Day of the Jackal (1973) and Dr. Who and the Daleks (1965). He was married to Tarne Phillips. He died on January 23, 2015 in Palm Beach Gardens, Florida, USA.
biography.name: Barrie Ingham

biography.bio: Derrick Sherwin was born in 1936 in High Wycombe, England. He is an actor and producer, known for Doctor Who (1963), United! (1965) and Paul Temple (1969). He has been married to Jane Sherwin since 1965.
biography.name: Derrick Sherwin

biography.bio: Malou Pantera was born in 1930. She is an actress, known for Horrors of the Black Museum (1959), Transatlantic (1960) and Female Fiends (1958). She is married to Thomas Wiseman.
biography.name: Malou Pantera

biography.bio: André Mikhelson is an actor, known for Children of the Damned (1964), The Divided Heart (1954) and I Am a Camera (1955).
biography.name: André Mikhelson

biography.bio: Josephine Gordon was born in 1931 in Hendon, Middlesex, England as Josephine R. Pilpel. She is known for her work on Princess Ida (1982), Coppélia (1957) and The Gods Go a-Begging (1946).
biography.name: Josephine Gordon

biography.bio: Norman Florence was born on January 3, 1933 in Cape Town, South Africa. He was an actor, known for Debbie Go Home (1962), The Long Duel (1967) and The Saint (1962). He died on December 17, 1996 in Wales.
biography.name: Norman Florence

filmingLocations.location: Merton Park Studios, Merton, London, England, UK
